price: Ènìyàn ń tọrọ aburú bí ó ṣe ń tọrọ ohun rere; ènìyàn sì jẹ́ olùkánjú.¹
arabic: وَيَدۡعُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ بِٱلشَّرِّ دُعَآءَهُۥ بِٱلۡخَيۡرِۖ وَكَانَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ عَجُولٗا
footnotes: 1. Ìyẹn ni pé, ènìyàn ń yára ṣépè lásìkò ìbínú. Ó sì yẹ kó ṣe sùúrù ni.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
